name: Deep Sea - Adventures of The Yellow Submarine Journey
name_original: Deep Sea - Adventures of The Yellow Submarine Journey
description:
The new Yellow Submarine Adventure is here for you iPhone,iPad and iPod touch,
Play and have Fun,
Download Now
How it works
TAP TAP on your screen to keep the Submarine Floating in deep sea.
Collect coins
unlock New Submariens
Avoid hitting any obstacles on your way to finish Levels,
share with Friends

thank you for you support
